name: Take him to his Mom
description:
Try the new driving game out.

Help the boy to meet his mother and try to make him reach his mom without any wounds and try to reveal why was he going to meet his mother in village.

You may download the file present below and it's only of 8 to 9 megabytes and that's suitable for windows with either 32 bit or 64 bit and that's really cool.
